heading: Code Editor
text: A seamlessly integrated code editor designed just for you. Leverage syntax highlighting to your advantage and excel in your interviews! Select the programming language that suits your needs and perform at your best.

heading: AI Interviewer
text: Meet your AI-powered Interviewer—a smart bot designed to simulate  real-life technical interviews. Based  on standardized formats from Fortune 500 companies and leading startups, it prepares you for the challenges of your dream job.

heading: Feedback
text: Receive personalized AI-driven feedback to celebrate your strengths or identify areas for improvement. Get actionable insights to overcome your weaknesses and ensure consistent progress toward future success.

heading: Dashboard
text: Your interactive dashboard is built to keep you informed. Track the number of interviews you’ve completed, update your profile, unlock achievements, and access much more—all in one place.
